Pages.Keywords: DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, customization, appearance customization, context menu, right-click menu
Pages.Description: The CustomizeContextMenu event allows you to customize the context menu in the Rich Text Editor.

Pages.Title: Mail Merge
Pages.Keywords: DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, mail merge
Pages.Description: Mail merge feature allows you to bind the control to an external data source, preview dynamic content in the opened document template, and generate the resulting document with merged data.

Pages.Title: Spell Check
Pages.Keywords: DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, spell check, grammar check
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Rich Text Editor ships with a built-in spell check service that can detect spelling errors and suggest corrections.

Pages.Title: AI-powered Extension
Pages.Keywords: Blazor, component, DxRichEdit, text editor, rich format, ai
Pages.Description: The DevExpress AI-powered extension for Rich Text Editor allows you to add AI-related commands that are designed to process text content to the editor's context menu.

Pages.Title: Overview
Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, day view, work week view, week view, appointment, resource, planner
Pages.Description: A calendar/scheduler component that displays a detailed snapshot of events/appointments across a single day, a week, or a month.

Pages.Title: View Types
Pages.Description: The Scheduler UI for Blazor can display regular and recurrent appointments in a Day, Work Week or Week View. The Scheduler also allows users to create, remove, and manage appointments.

Pages.Title: Week View
Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, week view

Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, work week view

Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, month view

Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, timeline view, time line, timeline

Pages.Title: Recurring Appointments
Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, recurring appointments, recurrence
Pages.Description: The Scheduler UI for Blazor can display regular and recurrent appointments in a Day, Work Week or Week View. The Scheduler also allows users to create, remove, and manage appointments.

Pages.Title: Resources
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Scheduler for Blazor allows you to assign resources to appointments. You can also use this feature to group appointments by resource or by date.

Pages.Title: Group by Resource
Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, resources, grouping, group, group by resource

Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, resources, resource navigatior, navigation

Pages.Title: Multiple Resources
Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, resources, resource sharing, multiple resources

Pages.Title: Customization
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Scheduler allows you to restrict/limit user actions. You can also create a custom appointment form with custom fields.

Pages.Title: Custom Fields and Appointment Form
Pages.Keywords: DxScheduler, scheduler, appointments, template, appointment template, customization, custom appointment appearance, appointment style, custom appointment UI, custom fields, custom field, custom properties, custom property, appointment custom field, customize appointment, appointment customization, appointment form, appointment edit form, customize edit form, custom appointment form

Pages.Description: The DevExpress Scheduler allows you to use templates to customize the appearance of component elements.

Pages.Title: Reports
Pages.Keywords: DxReportViewer, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Report Viewer is a native Blazor control that allows users to preview, print, and export reports to various formats.

Pages.Title: Report Designer (JavaScript based)
Pages.Keywords: DxReportViewer, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report designer, reportdesigner, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer, demo, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Report Designer is a JavaScript control integrated in Blazor framework that allows users to create and edit reports. Its preview functionality can be used to preview, print, and export reports.

Pages.Title: Reports
Pages.Keywords: DxReportViewer, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer, demo, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Report Viewer is a native Blazor control that allows users to preview, print, and export reports to various formats.

Pages.Title: Report Designer (JavaScript based)
Pages.Keywords: DxReportViewer, reports, reporting tool, devexpress reports, report designer, reportdesigner, report preview, report viewer, document viewer, reportviewer, documentviewer, demo, example
Pages.Description: The DevExpress Blazor Report Designer is a JavaScript control integrated in Blazor framework that allows users to create and edit reports. Its preview functionality can be used to preview, print, and export reports.

Pages.Title: Loading Panel
Pages.Keywords: loading panel, loading indicator, progress indication, DxLoadingPanel, progress, load progress
Pages.Description: A loading panel component that can display an overlay over components/containers.

Pages.Title: Progress Bar
Pages.Keywords: progress bar, progress panel, progress indicator, loading panel, loading indicator, circular bar, indeterminate bar, load progress
Pages.Description: A progress bar component that allows you to inform users about the status of ongoing processes.

Pages.Title: Wait Indicator
Pages.Keywords: loading, indicator, spinner, embed loading indicator, load, fetch data, time-consuming operations, DxWaitIndicator, loader, load progress
Pages.Description: A loading indicator component that displays progress of time-consuming operations. A wait indicator can be embedded into other UI components.

Products.Title: Grid
Products.Description: A fast and responsive Blazor Grid component with support for unlimited Master-Detail levels, in-cell Data Editing, and flexible Data Shaping options (Grouping, Sorting, Filtering, and Data Summary Computation).

Products.Title: Charts
Products.Description: An elegant, fast, and lightweight Blazor Charting library with 20+ built-in data presentation options (from Pie Charts to Line and Range Charts).

Products.Title: Scheduler
Products.Description: A feature-rich Scheduling/Event Management UI component designed to display detailed snapshots of events/appointments within your Blazor-powered web application (across a single day, a week, or more).

Products.Title: Data Editors
Products.Description: A comprehensive and high-impact suite of Blazor Data Editor components. Our Blazor Data Editors can be used as standalone components or within container components such as our Blazor Data Grid.

Products.Title: Rich Text Editor
Products.Description: A Microsoft Word-inspired Word Processing component for your next Blazor-powered web app. The DevExpress Rich Text Editor allows you to display, edit, and apply rich formatting to any text document.

Products.Title: Reports
Products.Description: DevExpress Reports for Blazor ships with an intuitive Visual Studio Report Designer and a comprehensive suite of report elements including Tables, Labels, Objects, Charts, Pivot Tables, and so much more.

Products.Title: Reports
Products.Description: DevExpress Reports for Blazor ships with an intuitive Visual Studio Report Designer and a comprehensive suite of report elements including Tables, Labels, Objects, Charts, Pivot Tables, and so much more.

Products.Title: Navigation
Products.Description: The DevExpress Navigation Suite includes a comprehensive suite of UI components designed to improve data presentation options, enhance overall usability, and extend app navigation choices within any Blazor-powered web app.

Products.Title: Layout
Products.Description: A unique suite of adaptive page Layout components designed to simplify app design and help enhance the overall usability of your Blazor-powered web app.

Products.Title: Dialogs and Windows
Products.Description: Leverage the power of DevExpress Dialogs and Windows UI components and easily display data and forms within either modal or non-modal dialog windows.

Products.Title: Pivot Table
Products.Description: Our Pivot Table UI control is blazing fast and allows you to quickly incorporate multi-dimensional data analysis and cross-tab reporting within your next Blazor-powered web app.

Products.Title: File Management
Products.Description: Our Blazor file management-related components allow you to upload files within your Blazor project at runtime.

Products.Title: Progress Indicators
Products.Description: Our Blazor UI Suite includes a collection of optimized Blazor Progress Indicators. Add our Progress Indicators to your next Blazor App to introduce intuitive usage feedback info and enhance overall responsiveness of your next great web app.

HomePage.Title: UI Components
HomePage.Keywords: Blazor, components, overview, getting started, devexpress, demo
HomePage.Description: The DevExpress Blazor UI component suite ships with a comprehensive suite of native Blazor components (including a DataGrid, Scheduler, Chart, Data Editors, Rich Text Editor, and Reporting). To learn more about the capabilities of our Blazor UI suite for your next great Blazor Web App, select a product from the list below. DevExpress Blazor UI controls ship as part of the DevExpress ASP.NET, DXperience, and Universal Subscriptions.
